title: Works
text: I love to create informative and imaginative data visualizations in my tools of choice: Tableau and R. Below are a few selected visualizationsâ€“you can view more at the California Teachers Study Tableau Public page and the Viz of the Month blog series, the goal of which is to provide researchers example code and instructions to implement visualizations in R.

title: Emma Spielfogel
text:
I am currently the Senior Research Data & Report Analyst for the California Teachers Study at City of Hope National Medical Center. When not innovating new ways to transform and visualize data, I enjoy taking long walks in L.A. neighborhoods and doing crosswords.


 






M.S. in Computer Information Systems, Database Management and Business Intelligence Concentration (anticipated Spring 2026)
Boston University | Boston, MA
B.A. in Biology, B.A. in French Studies, Minor in Neuroscience
Occidental College | Los Angeles, CA


 






City of Hope National Medical Center

Senior Research Data & Report Analyst | October 2023 - present
Research Data Analyst | August 2020 - September 2023
Clinical Research Assistant | October 2018 - July 2020
